originalText.text: Dr. Gafanovich is an amazing Doctor, she  seriously and genuinely cares about the long term health of her patients, always going the extra mile to ensure every medical need is treated and resolved. She also manages an awesome staff that is very courteous, professional, kind and truly embodies a spirit of compassion.

text.text: Dr. Gafanovich is an amazing Doctor, she  seriously and genuinely cares about the long term health of her patients, always going the extra mile to ensure every medical need is treated and resolved. She also manages an awesome staff that is very courteous, professional, kind and truly embodies a spirit of compassion.

originalText.text: Dr. G and her office are wonderful. They work fast and efficiently, really care about their patients and are consummate professionals. Loretta is amazing and takes great care in managing the office. In addition, because the practice is small, the staff can be and are extremely flexible- working around your schedule. I would recommend this practice to anyone.

text.text: Dr. G and her office are wonderful. They work fast and efficiently, really care about their patients and are consummate professionals. Loretta is amazing and takes great care in managing the office. In addition, because the practice is small, the staff can be and are extremely flexible- working around your schedule. I would recommend this practice to anyone.

originalText.text: Always a great experience for me! Dr. Gafanovich, Loretta, and the rest of the team are excellent - Their service, and personal touch is fantastic, and they really care for their patient’s wellbeing. They go above and beyond normal duty to try and accommodate your schedule which is hard to find in NYC. I highly recommend this clinic.

text.text: Always a great experience for me! Dr. Gafanovich, Loretta, and the rest of the team are excellent - Their service, and personal touch is fantastic, and they really care for their patient’s wellbeing. They go above and beyond normal duty to try and accommodate your schedule which is hard to find in NYC. I highly recommend this clinic.

originalText.text: Am so relieved to have found my reliable, thorough and attuned family doctor in Dr. Gafanovich, Loretta and the team. A specialist I see referred me to Dr. G, giving her very high praise. Praise that I amplify in the care I have received at her office; care that is consistent, especially when I also see Loretta. This office makes a great team, with a healthy culture.

Praise that I amplify in the care I have received at her office; care that is consistent, especially when I also see Loretta. This office makes a great team, with a healthy culture.

originalText.text: I love Dr. Gafanovich! She is an excellent doctor & truly cares about her patients. I never feel rushed & I always get a prompt response when I need to email the office about prescriptions or to make an appointment. I highly recommend Dr. G to anyone looking for a great physician in NYC.
